response.overview: New Year is the brightest holiday of the year. For many, New Year marks the beginning of a new life, because on this day even the biggest skeptics begin to believe in miracles. And if you believe, then miracles will surely happen and your most cherished desires will come true. The heroes of the film traditionally planned to spend the holiday with their families. But certain circumstances radically changed all their plans – New Year turned into a real fairy tale!
response.title: Одного разу на Новий рік
